alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 08 at 10:22AM CDT until May 15 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota...Minnesota... Red River of the North at Drayton affecting Walsh, Marshall, Pembina and Kittson Counties. Red River of the North at East Grand Forks affecting Polk and Grand Forks Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota...Minnesota... Red River of the North at Oslo affecting Polk, Grand Forks, Marshall and Walsh Counties. Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Clay and Cass Counties. Red River of the North at Pembina affecting Pembina and Kittson Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Oslo. * WHEN...Until early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Monday the stage was 29.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM CDT Monday was 30.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday morning and continue falling to 25.4 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
